THE PUBLIC RELATIONS BOARD
NEW YORK • WASHINGTON ■ HOLLYWOOD
75 EAST WACKER DRIVE • CHICAGO 1. ILLINOIS • RANDOLPH 6-2891
November 28, 195B
Mr, Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF
EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Underwood:
In a letter dated February 21;, 1958, you
informed Mr. Fred Seidner of this office
that you would let us know if your Network
Committee would be able to use the LIVING
AMERICA series, several tapes of which were
sent to you for audition.
Since we have not yet heard from you, we are
wondering if your Committee has discussed the
tapes - and, if so, what the result was.
We would appreciate hearing from you at your
earliest convenience.
9^
